protein.specific_function: Promotes endothelial cell sprouting and actin cytoskeletal reorganization. May be involved in angiogenesis. May function in Ca(2+) signaling

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides

reference.reference_text: Pan JY, Fieles WE, White AM, Egerton MM, Silberstein DS: Ges, A human GTPase of the Rad/Gem/Kir family, promotes endothelial cell sprouting and cytoskeleton reorganization. J Cell Biol. 2000 May 29;149(5):1107-16.
